content: The self-titled album from 1971 featuring hits like "Imagine" and "Jealous Guy" is by which British music legend?

That self-titled album from 1971, often referred to as the "Imagine" album, is by the legendary British musician John Lennon. It's one of his most iconic works, featuring not only "Imagine" and "Jealous Guy" but also other memorable tracks like "Crippled Inside" and "Gimme Some Truth." This album is widely regarded as one of the greatest in musical history and solidified John Lennon's status as a solo artist after the breakup of The Beatles.
